item.title: Data Pre-processing with Iris Dataset
item.description: Introduction to Pre-Processing data in R with the Iris Dataset Letâ€™s work with the built-in iris dataset, which contains data on 150 different species of iris flowers. Each entry contains the following measurements for the flowers: Sepal length Sepal width Petal length Petal width Species We will break down the basic steps that make up loading, viewing, and cleaning up the dataset. At the end, we will see the benefit and importance of having a clean dataset, and how failing to adequately do so can cause issues with our analyses.
